welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ban Rangsit, a charming city known for its lively markets, delicious street food, and warm hospitality. We invite you to immerse yourself in the local culture and enjoy all that Ban Rangsit has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Don Muang Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Don Muang Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Users must register with a valid email address to access the network.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suvarnabhumi International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Suvarnabhumi International Airport, mainly serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy 2 hours of free wifi access by registering with their email address.
